mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.ID as id, r.E_NAME as eName, r.ER_DATE as postDate, e.E_TYPE as eType, e.E_VIDEO_PATH as eVideoPath, e.E_CONTENT as eContent FROM EXERCISE_RECORD r JOIN EXERCIES e ON r.E_NAME = e.E_NAME WHERE TRUNC(ER_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) and ID=#{id} ORDER BY r.ER_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
